name: Ashe
description: The leader of the Deadlock Gang and a respected figure in the criminal underworld, Ashe deals with battlefield business by her own set of rules. She packs an explosive amount of firepower with two guns, a steady supply of dynamite, and a direct line to her trusty butler Bob.

abilities.name: The Viper
abilities.description: Semi-automatic rifle.  Hold to zoom in, increasing damage and accuracy but slowing rate of fire.

abilities.name: Coach Gun
abilities.description: Blast enemies in front of you and knock yourself backwards.

abilities.name: Dynamite
abilities.description: Throw an explosive that detonates after a short delay or immediately when shot.

abilities.name: B.O.B.
abilities.description: Deploy Bob. He charges forward and knocks enemies into the air, then attacks with his arm cannons.

story: Ashe was born into a wealthy family to parents who cared more for their fortune than their daughter. Ambitious and calculating, Ashe rebelled and formed the Deadlock Gang, which quickly gained infamy in the criminal underworld. Convincing the gangs of the Southwest to work together, Ashe has branded herself a legend, restoring the notoriety of the once-wild West.
